lyric:
[00:09.580]I had a dream so big and loud
[00:12.200]I jumped so high I touched the clouds
[00:14.690]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2

[00:21.580]We danced with monsters through the night
[00:24.390]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:28.760]I'm never gonna look back
[00:30.700]Woah, never gonna give it up
[00:33.070]No, please don’t wake me now
[00:38.700]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[00:41.430]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[00:45.480]My li-i-i-i-i-ife

tlyric:
[by:萌你一脸妹子i]

[00:14.690]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:19.330]我伸出双手摸向天空

[00:24.390]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
